name: Almira Wallet
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
What is the project about?
Blazing fast and secure crypto wallet that gives the power to manage crypto, NFT, and dApps at one place. Loaded with super features, rewards, and easy to use.


What makes your project unique?
we have a chat based decentralised crypto wallet 

History of your project.
just launched

What’s next for your project?
we are working on launchpad on our wallet 

What can your token be used for?
native token of our Almira wallet it can be use for launchpad participation and for swap
